properties.title: Kesch-Hütte SAC
properties.abstract:
Armée Suisse: Avis de tier: https://www.vtg.admin.ch/fr/actualite/messages/avis-de-tir.html#p/1/f/-
Armée Suisse: Avis de tier: https://www.vtg.admin.ch/fr/actualite/messages/avis-de-tir.html#p/1/f/-
properties.description: Located in the midst of Ela Nature Park with up-to-date infrastructure, the Chamanna digl Kesch attracts mountaineers and climbers as well as mountain bikers, seminar participants and families. In the Keschhut there are a game room and outdoor playground and bouldering possibilities are close to the cabin. In summer and winter it is a stopover on multi-day hikes (such as «Kesch-Trek» or «Haute Route Graubünden») between Albulatal and Flüela and between Engadin and Davos.
